keyPolicies.policyTitle: For a different type of MP
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrat MPs are community champions who always put their local communities first.
The party opposes the extreme Brexit that UKIP want and is fighting to ensure Wales depends on trade with Europe and access to the Single Market.
Liberal Democrats propose a 1p rise in income tax to raise £300m every year for Wales to spend on the NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Wales has a long history of electing hard-working liberal MPs who put people before party politics.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats will fight to ensure an extreme Brexit will not harm communities and families, advocating continued trade with Europe and access to the Single Market.
issues.health: Liberal Democrats aim to invest in the NHS, providing clear information on where the money is coming from. They mention the NHS is at a breaking point under the Conservatives.

housing.content: Extreme Brexit means fewer jobs, rising prices and higher rents and mortgages.

images.caption: Change Britain's Future by funding our NHS
